benchmark_details.name: STORM-BORN
benchmark_details.overview: STORM-BORN is a dataset designed to provide challenging mathematical derivations, sourced from recent academic papers. It ensures high-quality data through a human-in-the-loop and multi-agent framework, showcasing complex mathematical reasoning that LLMs struggle to solve.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance the reasoning capabilities of large language models through a dataset of complex mathematical problems.

data.annotation: Curated with human evaluations for complexity and correctness.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation includes manual scoring of mathematical proofs by experts against ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate stronger reasoning capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: Less than 5% accuracy on STORM-BORN for models like GPT-o1-Pro.
methodology.validation: Validated through expert reviews and comparative evaluations against state-of-the-art models.
